<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This StreamRef might refer to a smaller window over a larger stream.  In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that case we will have read out more bytes than we should return, because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we should not read past the end of the current view.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t MaxLength = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamrefbase/#af3f28458b55d3c2287703f1d631c8f23">getLength</a>() - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Buffer = Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aebf6ca7590d4f766b894044015a0fa31">slice</a>(0, MaxLength);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
